# Insignia of Warding (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)

**Target:** All wearers of special insignia within range

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Races of Destiny (WotC), pg. 166

This spell works just like *[[Insignia of Alarm (Spell)|insignia of alarm]]* except the insignia wearers also gain a +1 divine bonus to AC and on Fortitude saves.
